DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter cross-over cluster randomize control trial protocol study newborn infant ≥ 26 week gestational age require assist ventilation ( positive pressure ventilation [ PPV ] ) resuscitation delivery room compare T-piece resuscitator device versus resuscitation bag .
DOC.brief_title: Newborn Ventilation Delivery Room : Could Improved With T-piece Resuscitator ?
DOC.detailed_description: Design : A multicenter cross-over cluster randomize control trial . Our hypothesis base assumption ventilate depressed newborn T-piece resuscitator effective SIB increase proportion resuscitate newborns heart rate ( HR ) ≥ 100 beat per minute ( bpm ) two minute life proxy successful resuscitation . Population : Newborn infant ≥ 26 week gestational age require assist ventilation ( PPV ) resuscitation delivery room . ( need assist ventilation positive pressure : Heart Rate [ HR ] < 100 beat per minute [ bpm ] , apnea , gasping , cyanosis and/or hypotonia ) Intervention : PPV perform T-piece resuscitator ( Neopuff® group ) positive end expiratory pressure . Control : PPV perform self inflate bag ( SIB group ) without PEEP . Both device use face mask , peak inspiratory pressure ( PIP ) 25 cm H2O use begin ventilation PEEP 0 cm H2O subgroup without PEEP valve , 5 cm H2O subgroup PEEP valve SIB group , 5 cm H2O Neopuff® group . Objective : To compare effectiveness instrument reach heart rate ≥ 100 bpm depress newborn ≥ 26 week ' gestational age ( GA ) initiation positive pressure ventilation ( PPV ) face mask . Primary Outcome : Proportion newborn HR ≥ 100 bpm 2 minute life . Type Comparison : Which two device Neopuff TM Self Inflating Bag ( NP/SIB ) effective ventilation newborn , increase proportion resuscitate newborns heart rate ( HR ) ≥ 100 beat per minute ( bpm ) two minute life proxy successful resuscitation .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Liveborn infant ≥ 26 week ` GA HR < 100 bpm require resuscitation positive pressure ventilation mask delivery room accord current AAP/AHA recommendation Infants require intubation birth . Newborns < 26 weeks´ GA. Newborns present major congenital malformation . Multiple birth . Problems ( difficulty malfunction ) device assign .
